hero.description: Bridging design and development, I offer a unique blend of creative and technical skills. My expertise in both graphic design and web development allows me to create visually stunning and highly functional digital experiences.

about.title: ABOUT ME
about.backgroundText: With roots in media technology and design, my journey began at HTBLA Leonding and flourished at the University of Applied Sciences Upper Austria. Since 2015, I've been immersed in the dynamic world of web development and design, constantly evolving with the industry.

design.title: Design
design.description: Creating visually stunning designs using the Adobe Creative Suite and Figma, transforming concepts into compelling visual experiences.

development.title: Development
development.description: Building responsive websites with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP, enhanced by WordPress and backed by MySQL databases.

uiux.title: UI/UX Design
uiux.description: Crafting intuitive user interfaces and experiences that blend aesthetics with functionality.

about.approachText: Just as in tennis, my approach to projects is driven by precision and continuous improvement. I thrive on new challenges and believe in creating solutions that not only meet but exceed expectations. Working collaboratively, I bring both technical expertise and creative vision to every project.

portfolio.title: PORTFOLIO
portfolio.hint: Click or swipe to discover more projects
